text:
Hey everyone,

I keep getting this error, when I want to specify the source code of an image element at the template level.

Can you please tell me how to overcome this warning? the idea is to inject the image from the theme package instead of using file manager? Can you please tell me what the best practice is?

That's not a valid source for the file and wont work.
 
The src field expects a URL and does not interpret HubL. So you are passing an invalid URL.


If you simply want a default for when nothing is selected code your module to use your default image if the user has not specified one.

When images are used in module fields that generally means they are some form of content. In that instance it is better to store the image in the file manager so that content creators can easily replace the image later
